{"id":415961969,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1604322555,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/415961969/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Kth Smallest Instructions","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string kthSmallestPath(vector<int>& destination, int k) {\n        \n        int MAXN = 20;\n        long long int ncr[MAXN][MAXN];\n        \n        for(int i = 1;i<MAXN;i++){\n            ncr[i][0] = ncr[i][i] = 1;\n            for(int j = 1;j<i;j++){\n                ncr[i][j] = ncr[i-1][j-1] + ncr[i-1][j];\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int N = destination[0] ,M= destination[1];\n        int L = N + M;\n        \n        \n        auto ranker= [&](int a,int b){\n            return ncr[a][b];\n        };\n        string ans;\n        \n        int currank = 0;\n        int cntH = M,cntV = N;\n        \n        for(int i = 0;i<L;i++){\n            int rankH,rankV;\n            if(cntH-1 > 0) rankH = ranker(cntH-1,cntV); else rankH =- 1;\n            if(cntV-1 > 0) rankV = ranker(cntH,cntV-1); else rankV =- 1;\n            \n            int ranka = currank + rankH;\n            int rankb = currank + rankV;\n            \n            if(rankH > 0 && rankV > 0){\n                if(ranka <= k){\n                    ans += 'H';\n                    cntH -= 1;\n                }else{\n                    ans += 'V';\n                    cntV -= 1;\n                }\n            }else if(rankH > 0){\n                ans += 'H';\n                cntH -= 1;\n            }else{\n                ans += 'V';\n                cntV -= 1;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"kth-smallest-instructions"}
